__TOC__

* July 7th :  premier samedi du libre (PSL) in Paris. This is a multi-distribution small install fest where around 60 people come to get help configuring and installing their Linux system (http://www.agendadulibre.org/showevent.php?id=6621).

* July from 19th to 22th inclusive : the festival « Les Vieilles Charrues » in Carhaix (http://www.vieillescharrues.asso.fr/2012/), where we put a webcafé stand.

* July 22th : picnic with Mozilla's and other associations members in Paris.

* July 31th : IRC meeting for the re-approval.
